ygData.msgSnippet: Tucson stands solidly in front of the door and nods back to Big Convoy and the others.  All right, we won that round, but I think we aren t finished yet.

Tucson stands solidly in front of the door and nods back to Big Convoy and =
the others.

" All right, we won that round, but I think we aren't finished=
 yet.  Thanks for your help, you all did a great job.  Now, let's show Magm=
atron what we're made of."

Don't be envious of what you don't have, be gra=
teful for things you already posses.  Nothing is worth more than family and=
 friends.

On Nov 30, 2011, at 2:24 PM, Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@gmail=
.com> wrote:

> > <OLD>
> >
> > Tucson wasn't about to give into them. It w=
as clear as the snarl on his
> > face and the narrow of his brow that he wa=
s not going to let anyone step all
> > over him. He folds in his wings to p=
rotect them from harm and on all
> > fours, manages to lunge forward toward=
 the guards, with open jaws, hoping to
> > catch and toss one of them into =
the other, creating a domino effect.
> > His strong tail acts like a rudder=
 as it slaps hard against the wall.
> 
> <NEW>
> 
> As TUSCON lunged out, B=
IG CONVOY, MACH KICK and BREAK stepped out as
> well, firing lasers up and =
around TUSCON targeting the SHARKTICON
> guards.
> 
> Quickly the guards ar=
e dispatched!
> 
> The lead one is caught by TUSCON and sent flying back in=
to two others
> while the rest are caught by the laser fire from MACH KICK =
and BREAK.
> 
> BIG CONVOY backs up TUSCON as well, his own firepower, whil=
e tightly
> controlled in this tight quarter, is powerful and forceful as h=
e
> opened up with his laser cannons.
> 
> Soon enough the SHARKTICONS are =
lying in heaps strewn about the floor
> and the walls are scortched from th=
e exchange of energy that came
> through. There are also various dents and =
abrasions are on the wall
> from where SHARKTICONS were caught and thrown i=
nto it.
> 
> The door they came through still stands open.
> 
> (TAG)
> 
> =
- Preston
>

<html><head></head><body bgcolor=3D"#FFFFFF"><div>Tucson stands solidly in =
front of the door and nods back to Big Convoy and the others.</div><div><br=
></div><div>" All right, we won that round, but I think we aren't finished =
yet.  Thanks for your help, you all did a great job.  Now, let's =
show Magmatron what we're made of."<br><br>Don't be envious of what you don=
't have, be grateful for things you already posses.  Nothing is worth =
more than family and friends.</div><div><br>On Nov 30, 2011, at 2:24 PM, Su=

Tucson wasn't about to give into them.  It was clear as the snarl on his<br=
>
> face and the narrow of his brow that he was not going to let anyone =
step all<br>
> over him.   He folds in his wings to protect them from ha=
rm and on all<br>
> fours, manages to lunge forward toward the guards, w=
ith open jaws, hoping to<br>
> catch and toss one of them into the other=
, creating a domino effect.<br>
> His strong tail acts like a rudder as =
it slaps hard against the wall.<br>
<br>
<NEW><br>
<br>
As TUSCON lun=
ged out, BIG CONVOY, MACH KICK and BREAK stepped out as<br>
well, firing la=
sers up and around TUSCON targeting the SHARKTICON<br>
guards.<br>
<br>
Qui=
ckly the guards are dispatched!<br>
<br>
The lead one is caught by TUSCON a=
nd sent flying back into two others<br>
while the rest are caught by the la=
ser fire from MACH KICK and BREAK.<br>
<br>
BIG CONVOY backs up TUSCON as w=
ell, his own firepower, while tightly<br>
controlled in this tight quarter,=
 is powerful and forceful as he<br>
opened up with his laser cannons.<br>
<=
br>
Soon enough the SHARKTICONS are lying in heaps strewn about the floor<b=
r>
and the walls are scortched from the exchange of energy that came<br>
th=
rough. There are also various dents and abrasions are on the wall<br>
from =
where SHARKTICONS were caught and thrown into it.<br>
<br>
The door they ca=
me through still stands open.<br>
